children.subject: You could go to the major that the class is for.
For a Haas/CS double major should you go to L&S CS or your Haas adviser?
Hard cap. The system won't let you enroll until the adviser raises your unit cap.
There are no soft caps in the enrollment system.
Is 20.5 a hard cap or a soft cap (i.e. you can sign up for the class that puts you over, as long as you have space beforehand)

Hello, I was just able to get off the waitlist for a grad class yesterday. I met with an advisor this morning, and submitted the form shortly afterwards. Would I be able to know if I can expect a response soon? Thanks.

At this time, all submitted requests for CS Declared students should have been reviewed and you should have been notified via email. REQUESTS SUBMITTED WEDNESDAY 9/12 WILL LIKELY NOT BE REVIEWED. REQUESTS SUBMITTED AFTER WEDNESDAY 9/12 WILL NOT BE REVIEWED
Is there a form to fill out for Spring 2019? If I am double majoring would I also have to meet with an advisor from the other major?

history.content:
Requesting Approval to Enroll in More Than 20.5 Units

  • L&S Undeclared students – meet an L&S College Adviser to request an approval for additional units in the third week of the term.  (Note: In most cases, approvals are granted only for those students whose record demonstrates a history of strong academic performance with full course loads.)
  • L&S Computer Science declared students – please fill out this form and your request will be reviewed in the third week of classes.
  • EECS and other College of Engineering Students: Contact your ESS Adviser
